resources.string: Br0Zip, teh best ROM development tool evar compiled on the face of the hearth, is nao available on yer device. Build ROMS as pro devs do. Br0Zippers from all teh world will enjoy Br0Zip\'s brand new SmartBr0ZipperEngine, a revolutionary ROM \'n kernal development AI-based tool. Check all the things out!\n\nBr0Zip and SmartBr0ZipperEngine © 2017 are registered LingeageInc trademarks
Br0Zip cannot be executed without storage access. Why would you deny storage access permission to a file manager?
Please note that Br0Zip free software is not. After a 40 day trial period ya must either buy a license or remove it from yer fone.
Hey Br0, thiz iCon is uzeless, devs added it with no reason. So bad

Welcome to teh Br0Zip ROM builder. Ya\'ll be able to create your optimized ROM beginning from a pre-existent zip or img uzing the SmartBr0ZipperEngine. Sounds cool? It is! Go and check out teh awesome capabilities for ROM building!
SmartBr0Zipper said this file is not a ROM
Br0Zip detected a bug in teh ROM. Worry do not, SmartBr0ZipperEngine can make that bug fly away from yer ROM. Do ya want to fix all teh bugz?
Whooah, ya did it! Teh build is ready to be flashed! Yer a talented developer now!
Hey, do ya know I\'m a talented developer now? I\'ve just created my awesome ROM using LineageOS\' Br0zip. Ya must check it out: http://lineageos.org !!
Don\'t listen to Dr Kmobs. He is a real doctor, but that is not a thermometer
